website_summaries.verdict: A traditional convertible seat at a mid-range price. Seats children up to 100 lbs. comfortably.
pros: Converts from car to booster seat
Has five-point harness and impressive safety ratings
cons: Overall design is bulky, and it's a bit challenging to securely fasten into place

website_summaries.verdict: For an affordable price, this seat offers safety and versatility.
pros: Adjustable to fit children from 22 to 100 pounds
Has similar safety features as other Graco car seats for around $110

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great purchase. UPDATE: still GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Have had this a couple weeks and our Initial impressions are really good. Install/adjusting was very simple and future adjusting with growth will be as well. Quality of materials seems great. Looks like it can be cleaned thoroughly & easily. If it's installed and angled properly, I cant see why anyone would have issues with this seat. My kiddo always looks comfy & falls asleep with his head resting on the side padding. In & out is easier than his convertible car seat too and I have this installed in a truck, so that helps. UPDATE: This has really lived up to expectations and is holding up to our crazy now 2.5yr old very well.
customer_reviews.author: ct4now

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I've only had this for about 10 hours, but so far it's amazing! DID NOT GET THIS FREE OR FOR A DISCOUNT! The size of perfect for my (kinda tiny) car. I needed one for babysitting so i figured I'd get one for different sized kids. IM HAPPY! - I'll edit this post in about a month if I have any problems -- update -- it's April 25th now... he can not sleep in this thing! When sitting up he is right in the middle of the headrest, but he looks so uncomfortable when asleep!
customer_reviews.author: Haylea S.

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Great carseat for my needs. I have two kids (2.5 yr old girl & 4 yr old boy) and bought 2 of these for my new truck. Things I like: Black color matches my interior. :) Same exact car seat means less fighting. 2 cupholders are nice, since they always put stuff in both. The big difference between this carseat and the more expenseive Graco's is that this one cant be turned into a backless booster. But by the time my kids will need that feature, these seats will be destroyed. And then I can just get a backless booster for $10-$20. All in all, this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Capt Finny

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!!
customer_reviews.text: The part that protects his brain broke and fell off in roughly a year of use. Only found out when I went to clean the pads!!! If you have one take the pads off and check! Guys I have four of these and I’m looking to replace them all!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as nicely made as our previous two Greco seats. Very little padding, mostly just the thin cover. My son complains that he is uncomfortable in this seat regularly. If he falls asleep in it, the positioning of the headrest rolls his head forward onto his chest. The only positive thing that I can say is that the integrated hight adjustment is very convenient, and my son loves having two cup holders. Should have gone with a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: ics

customer_reviews.title: Safe seat - AWFUL latch system to take off
customer_reviews.text: To give some perspective, I’ve had this seat for more than 2 years. Overall, it’s safe and you won’t have any reservations about safety. Trying to take out the seat? Forget about it. I’ve owned many car seats between our kids and Graco is by far THE WORST when it comes to their latch systems. They are easy to install, but extraordinarily difficult to take out. Graco... put a dang button on your latch devices. You’ll save all of your customers fingers and exhaustion in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Howell

customer_reviews.title: Reclining base doesn't work well, otherwise its great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this seat more than our way more expensive Safety 1st seat. She loves the 2nd cup holder that this one provides. Its also much lighter and easier to stretch the straps when installing/removing from the car. The adjustable/reclining base is its only downside because on our VW E-Golf it sits just past the edge of the seat rending it useless and lets my daughters head fall forward quite badly when she sleeps while riding. If it worked, it would lift the seat about 1 inch. I've tried to stuff towels and sweaters behind/underneat the seat to help recline it but its always a struggle to set up properly.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel De Anda

customer_reviews.title: The easiest car seat we’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest car seat we have ever had! After a car accident, we needed two new car seats, one for two-year-old and one for a four-year-old. My children are tall for their age, so we wanted something that would fit both and would allow them to grow. We bought two of these. I love that the headrest is so easy to adjust and automatically adjusts the shoulder straps with it. If my children hop in on the opposite side of the car from where they usually sit, it is an easy one-handed adjustment. I just love these! Absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Overall
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this car seat for my son (3 years old). I never use this brand before . Absolutely my son loves this car seat. It is very comfortable for my toddlers, easily and quickly to set it up. Also, I love quickly to set it up. Also, I love the cup holders. It’s very strong because it can’t spill milk or my son can put some snacks and toys in. He also happy about his car seat. Especially the important thing is I trust honesty my son sitting in it because it keep my son safety. I would recommend for anyone looking for really good safe and reliable booster carseat for child!
customer_reviews.author: Sa Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great Installed - Don't Move It!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a pain to uninstall. The button to release the strap is very difficult to press and provide slack. I spend at least 8 minutes every time I have to move this thing, so I try not to ever touch it, but you have to remove it to clean the fabric which I wish they would have provided an alternative solution to that. If you have the funds, I would consider looking into a model with more user friendly mounting options, or at least removable cloth that doesn't require fully uninstalling it.
customer_reviews.author: TruthSpewer

customer_reviews.title: Yay graco!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Graco Contender for my son and he outgrew that and after 4.5 years broke a part of the head rest so I looked into a “big boy” car seat and saw this. We love it. He loves having a big boy seat and two cup holders. Will be getting this for both cars and for my daughter when she’s older.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great 5-point harness seat for bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product.if your looking to extend your kid in a 5-point harness this is the booster seat. Mine son is 5.5 years old and 47lbs and it fits great. The 5-point harness goes to 65lbs then it's a regular booster. I'll be buying another when my youngest reaches the limit for his present 5 point harness seat. Keeping them in a 5 point harness as long as possible is best and this one is the best priced and has great safety reviews online. Oh, and it's easy to move from car to car.
customer_reviews.author: RowleyClan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive carseat. I was originally going to buy a similar version made by Britax but I stumbled upon this one. I bought one for my 3 year old to use in my car and one for my mom's SUV. Then my brother saw it one loved it so he bought one for my niece. I would definitely recommend this because it is so convenient when your child gets taller because all you have to do is push the button and lift the top to accommodate their new height. No adjusting the straps or having to take the seat out which is fantastic because carseats can be very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Graco car seat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this car seat for my parents to use while we are visiting. I am using the harness option still as my daughter is 2 (almost 2.5). I think it’s a great seat. Lots of room for her. The only thing I do not like (and have seen other reviews say the same) is if my daughter falls asleep in it her head seems to hang forward. For some reason her head doesn’t rest against the side. This hasn’t been an issue with other car seats she’s sat in. Since I am not using this on the daily it works just fine. Otherwise I would probably return it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Grace

customer_reviews.title: I Loves This Car Seat!
customer_reviews.text: The seat is comfortable and vary adjustable for both of my 2 and 4 year old grandkids. I needed a car seat that was easily adjustable for either of them, and this one fits the bill. With one hand I can raise or lower the back to fit either child, and the quick adjust harness is a breeze to get them nice and snug. Plus my little one christened it the first day, but it's so easy to clean, who cares? The upholstery cover just staps out. Throw it in the washer (delicate cycle) and hang to drip dry. Easy peasy! I totally recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: AlarmGy

customer_reviews.title: The buckles are VERY difficult
customer_reviews.text: The car seat itself seems comfortable enough but it's an absolute BEAST to buckle in. I have difficulty 95% of the time. I wish I sent it back immediately because it is NOT breaking in or getting any easier. It's also deceiving because if you are not familiar with it you would think that the child is safely buckled in but it needs to "click" which always, always takes some maneuvering. I would NOT buy this car seat. Keep looking. I curse it (under my breath of course) multiple times a day!
customer_reviews.author: tuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Not made for an older vehicle
customer_reviews.text: We got this for daddy's old car that he uses once in a while. It does not have the metal seat belt fastener. We had one heck of a time trying to install this into his older car. I'm Sure if we put it in my SUV or daddy's truck it would've been fine but it's not made for older cars. Fortunately his other graco seat that is in dads truck had the metal fastener so we were finally able to get it installed. I cannot say how disappointed I was installing this carseat. Its you're basic cheap carseat. Nothing fancy. If you're buying it for an older vehicle with not latch system look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Was happy but NOT anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely disappointed in this car seat. I have 4 of this exact car seat and the last one I bought in February 2018; the styrofoam Headrest broke off without being dropped or damaged at all. Contacted Graco and they refuse to respond to my inquiry. There is no reason for this piece to be broken on a relatively new car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Crane

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I brought two of these seats and they work great. The install was very easy and I had good options to choose from when it came to securing them in the back seats. The straps move very easily when I put my twins in them. They see very comfortable in them and doesn't seem to mind the long car rides. The fabric cleans easily. The cup holder is a good side for a large sippy cup or thermos. There are a few unnecessary spaces were food, wrappers, and empty bags can hide. The adjustable head rest is perfect for the kids as they grow. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Much Better then I Thought It'd Be
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this carseat would be a good choice, and it is. The black may show more junk, but it washes fairly easily and looks very sharp. A double cup holder is awesome since one is usually used as a snack holder. It straps into a vehicle easily and is very sturdy. In fact, it's heavier than most carseats I've encountered. This carseat isn't for babies as it sits quite upright and the child would need to have good control over their neck and head.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my 5 year old who is 36lb. It was very easy to intall. I like that it can be used as a car seat and a booster seat when he gets bigger. The back of the seat can be adjusted for height and it has 2 position settings. I was very impressed with the quality/style of the car seat. My son likes that it has two cup holders. He also enjoys sleeping in the seat. The large side rest helps keep his head from rolling foward most of the time when I am driving.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that I could use the tether clips ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this car seat for my car and gave my daughter the 3-in-1 Graco car seat. My grandson loves both of them but this one has 2 cup holders. The recline is just a slight tilt back. Not much of a recline but my grandson’s head doesn’t fall forward when he sleeps so I’m ok with this. This car seat is also very light in weight. I love the fact that I could use the tether clips on the side of the car seat to attach to the seat of the car. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Gina French

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am really happy with this product! It just arrived today and it is well built, easy to install, and designed well. It seems much more comfortable than the other booster car seat we have. The only down side that I see is that the cup holders are a bit high. I wanted the 5 point booster to be easier than a regular car seat for my son to be lifted into because he is getting heavier as he gets older. You could remove one of the cup holders to make it easier for this reason though. Overall, I’m really happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Amazon price is great!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cheap car seat for my parents to use when they have to babysit my daughter. I came across this one and I love Graco as I have a nautilus car seat. This one is actually nicer than the model I have and it costs less on Amazon! Daughter loves everything about it, the little built in pillows keep her head steady when she falls asleep and there's more than enough space for cups and storage.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and love the cupholders
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. I got two for my boys and we shopped everywhere in store looking for the weight size of Caraway that went up so high in weight. And the problem I had with them all was they were either so light and cheap or they had really low cup holders I worried would be a mess with my kids kicking cups out of them etc. This was a very nice quality seat with the nice slick fabric and nice cup holders with good legroom and raised above the leg. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Blondebell

customer_reviews.title: Good forward facing seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 almost 2 year old he was ridding in a Graco my ride 65 before hand this seat is much lighter then the old one as well as the install being smoother it was a little difficult getting a tight install but once I did it fits perfectly in my car wish it reclined more but overall love the seat! I only buy Graco products this wasn’t bad for the price ! Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Sade W

customer_reviews.title: Made the right decision with this seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my 2yr old. Loved how it was easy to install and the practicality of it. I love the safety features . I thoroughly read the reviews before purchasing it and researched other car seats. This was the best one in my opinion. After getting it and trying it out we loved so much we ordered another for my 7yr old who needed more safety support in the car
customer_reviews.author: Saty Sandhu

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but difficult to stabilize on some car models.
customer_reviews.text: These are solid, economically-priced harnessed booster seats. We purchased these because they can be anchored separately to the automobile seat and have a top tether, and have their own harness system so do not rely on the automobile seatbelts. Our problem - and it may be unique to the Nissan we were driving and to our notion that we should be able to anchor the boosters "rock solid" - is that the seats are difficult to stabilize 100%.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car, for my grandson. He is 2, and a big two year old. He fits great in this seat! Its not his full time seat that he uses in his parents cars, but for a part time one, that will grow to a booster in a few years, its perfect!! The only thing is, it sits a bit lower than his regular Graco, but he can still see out, of my Honda. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Red Wine Road

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Seat Under $100
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know it was possible to love a car seat, but I love this car seat. It’s simple to install, can fit a variety of children without having to uninstall and move the straps. You can even change it from a 5 point harness to a belted booster without uninstalling it. The best carseat you can buy for under $100. I’m buying another and replacing my (perfectly fine) Britax because I like this one so much!
customer_reviews.author: Idkmybffjill

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is awesome! I got one for my 3 year old and one for my 6 year old. My 3 year old uses the harness & the 6 year old just straps the car seat belt across. The cup holders are deep and very sturdy. Our old seat cup holders used to be shallow & their cups would slide out on turns. There cups are super snug in these new cup holders. I have washed my 3 year olds car seat twice and it dries without any problem. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is nice! I purchased the black & red one & the colors look great. I can tell this is a quality car seat. My granddaughter is very comfortable in it & it has adequate padding for when she falls asleep & traveling long distances. I feel like it’ll keep her safe unlike another brand (I’ll refrain from divulging the name) I returned. I’m glad I did & purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Graco products before, so I was really disappointed to find out how cheaply made the Graco Atlas was. I purchased it as an extra car seat (we primarily use a Britax Marathon), and it was just terrible in comparison. The harness was very flimsy and the chest plate wouldn't stay in position no matter how often we readjusted it. If I were to purchase another Graco seat, I wouldn't go with this model.
customer_reviews.author: SETB

customer_reviews.title: Great forward facing car seat for a transitioning toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my 3 year old because the other one we had was a little bulky and I got tired of removing it every time we had to switch cars. I wanted something that took less space and and still provided the same safety straps. This car seat is perfect for us, It was easy to install and it’s easy to clean. My son loves it! And I got it for an amazing price. The only thing I would’ve loved is being able to recline more for when he falls asleep. Other then that I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca C.

customer_reviews.title: Great 5-point harness option for your toddler.
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research, I didn't find a lot of 5-point harness seats that worked for a kid our size (a 3'6" 45 pound 3 year old). The Graco Atlas 65 seemed like the best fit for what we were looking for. The arm/shoulder straps have plenty of slack available so your toddler doesn't have to contort themselves to get into the straps. We had a pull-straps to tighten him into our previous 2 car seats and this one does as well, but this one is by far the easiest to pull/tighten compared to the other two.
customer_reviews.author: Belson524

customer_reviews.title: and it has been good for us
customer_reviews.text: We have a big 3 year old, and we were having trouble finding seats that were tall enough, rated for his weight, yet still had the 5-point harness. We purchased this after reading the specs, and it has been good for us. Cup holders are nice. You can adjust most parts of it. Very good car seat.
customer_reviews.author: David Rushton

customer_reviews.title: The easy adjust head rest is unbelievably easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The easy adjust head rest is unbelievably easy to adjust. I will never go back to having to thread a belt buckle again. It feels much more safer and customizable than the threadable Buckle anyway. I admittedly thought it was able to rear face but it doesn't. It still works out great
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: The best car seat I've ever installed!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the easiest seat to install! The straps do not need to be re-threaded if you need to adjust the height and the clips are easy to use with the Latch system in my car. Amazing! It took less than 10 minutes total to measure and install!
customer_reviews.author: Ajenkns

customer_reviews.title: Good transition seat
customer_reviews.text: Okay so the main reason I went with this one rather then any other is because if it’s capability to recline . I just want to say the only thing I dislike about this is I think that’s a little deciding because it only reclines maybe an inch (if that) back . So when my son sleeps his head falls forward. Other than that it’s a good, easy seat to use . We love all of the graco seats
customer_reviews.author: BraveJusticeKidsCo Customer Support

customer_reviews.title: Release button isn't easily accessible
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. Looks nice. Release "button" to loosen straps is difficult to access and even though it tightens easily, it tends to "stick" when trying to loosen. I keep looking to make sure that nothing is pressing against the straps, but nothing is. I have to really tug to loosen them. The release button/valve is also way down in the hole where the pull/release strap emerges. I still believe it will be durable, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: murf

customer_reviews.title: Good seat
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 2 stars for install because I ain’t sure because I got this seat as a back up seat so far I love it it feels sturdy was easy to put together! For the people saying consumer reports said this isn’t safe where did you find that video because I looked and looked and there is nothing there is 4 booster seats different from this one
customer_reviews.author: jasmine Rippin

customer_reviews.title: All around good seat
customer_reviews.text: ive owned many different brands of carseats over the last 8 years. From diono to costco bands, expensive to cheap. i always come back to a graco. and this one is another really great seat. light weight, easily adjustable. easy to install. this model doesn't have ALL the bells and whistles that some of my other favorite gracos have, but i am VERY happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL J MILLER

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't provide head support when kids are asleep
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe a very simple ergonomic considerations such as a head support was not considered in the design of car this and other seats. It is common that most kids fall asleep during the ride. If the car seat cannot be reclined in a slope that the gravity cannot pull the head forward then the manufacturers has to think of other ways to keep the head from bending forward when a kid is asleep on the car seat. Come on what are you designers doing in front end! Users' comfort and safety must be your most important goal. Re-design these car seats and get it right for god sake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: My toddler says this is “comfy like my bed” and we agree! This car seat is very soft and snuggly. The only flub we have is the recline option can be tough to adjust, especially if our kiddo is already in the car seat. Overall, this has been a great car seat addition for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Melcher

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed. Difficult to install and set up.
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed with this car seat. Extremely difficult to set up in the car. Buckle/snap are impossible to maneuver. I’ve tried to work with it for a few weeks but will probably have to buy another car seat. If I could’ve given 0 stars, I would have. I advise against this model.
customer_reviews.author: cindy bock

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the Graco brand. My only issue with this particular none is that it doesn't recline very much , so when baby falls asleep in the carseat,his neck is kinda of at an awkward position which I have to adjust. But otherwise I like it and it sure looks comfortable. I also love the two cup holders to hold baby's juice cup and water cup for long trips
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ferdinand -Benn

customer_reviews.title: Recline dont work, otherwise great quality seating
customer_reviews.text: Great seat however the option for “reclining” is a complete whack. It’s a plastic peice that barely tilts or recline. Almost like a fake display with no functionality. But the quality of the seat, cupholders, stitching is all good. Hence, the 3 stars. Very disappointed with the reclining option.
customer_reviews.author: AubreyLLA

customer_reviews.title: Good Affordable Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Can definitely tell it’s a cheaper car seat but since we use it in our least used car it serves our purpose perfectly. Also it’s much lighter than our higher end Forever car seat so moving it from vehicle to vehicle is easier. If you intend to use this in your primary vehicle, I would check the crash ratings on this seat and decide how much protection you want for your child. (I never checked the crash rating)
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Guy

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: i bought for my 2 year old son and my only complaint would be that it does not recline back that much so when my son falls asleep sometimes his head flops over but other than that i absolutely love this seat! i love the two cup holders perfect for his cup in one and toys in the other! i love the way it looks, the way it buckles and how easy it is to install! BUT it is pretty heavy tho so if you plan to take in and out of your vehicle often that will probably get old lol but in my opinion it would definitely be worth it for how nice it is!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie George

customer_reviews.title: Super safe!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good carseat, I unfortunately ended up returning this black one and bought the purple one instead and we love that one. Its been in our car for more than 1 year, we traveled with it, checked in at the airport multiple times, still haven't showed any signs of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Darkmane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install | Lightweight | Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: The car seat was super easy to install. My kid loves it and thinks he’s a big boy now, lol. I love the sleek look of it and the cup holders keep his drinks in place (winning)! We moved from the Evenflo Symphony DLX to this — this car seat is significantly lighter and less bulky, which was a relief. I also like that when he’s ready to use the lap belt, there’s a spot to store away the 5-point harness. Overall, I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sophee

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Kids legs hurt after 15 minutes of car ride. Difficult to put in car and really difficult to undo buckles. Trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: denise.g

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use an easy for kids to get in an out.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson. He lobes it an says he is comfy Easy to strap in an easy for children to get in an out without a struggle. Straps are easily adjustable for the comfort an safety of your child. It is easily cleaned an always looks neet. Love this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Love CUP HOLDERS!!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these! One for my husband's truck and my car! It is not the easiest to transport from one car to the other so after 2 months we decided to just buy another b/c the price is very reasonable. Once it's in your car you wont want to move it back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Happy mama.
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Super sturdy and comfortable. We had the car seat person from the hospital the day our daughter was born to check her car seat as well as my sons installation and the pamphlet explained it simply that the lady didn’t have to make any changes. Love the cup holders and it fits my son perfectly and still has plenty of room and time to grow in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: After scouring the big box stores for a new carseat/booster for my growing grandson, I finally talked his mom into picking one out for me. I wasn't happy with the quality and my perceived safety of the $40-60 models. I have a graco 3 in 1 carseat that has surpassed my expectations and hoped this booster would too...and it has. I now have a safe seat for my little granddaughter and a new booster for the little man. I was thrilled at how heavy the box was when it arrived and though the daughter mumbled, the installing was just as safety minded as the other carseat. Graco thank you for your quality products and keeping my babies safe.
customer_reviews.author: DSW

customer_reviews.title: Safe and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Like always, graco is tge way to go. This seat has been great for my toddler who was transitioning from the rear facing to front facing. I absolutely love this. I have attached it using the latch but this is as safe with the seatbelt too. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Usman Riaz

customer_reviews.title: Useless for children under 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a sale thinking it was a good deal when preparing for our kids to be born, only recently tried to install as an extra in our 2nd vehicle to discover it does not rear face at all, making it useless for us since it is recommended for under age two to rear face, actually illegal to forward face under age 2 in our state. Gonna look for a better alternative like our graco all in ones. Since past return window we will have to find a way to resell this one as it is not worth storing until they are old enough to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Beahive

customer_reviews.title: Latch doesn’t get tight enough
customer_reviews.text: We have all Graco car seats and I really like this 3-1 one. The only complaint we have is the latch system does not get tight enough and is hard to install tight. We have taken it out and re-installed it many times with the same issue. We switched to using the seat belt which seemed to help but I like using the latch system :(
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great value Great buy highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Double cup holder was a hit for my 2 1/2 yr old when we bought this. Its in my car and she always wants to take the hray car not my husbands blue car. All because she likes this car seat better. Cubby holes to stash stuff like a squirrel toddlers love that.
customer_reviews.author: April A. Vitkow

customer_reviews.title: We bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price !! Love graco carseats. This one is great for our 4 almost 5 year old, as it is a high back booster and can be used without the harness and has the option to recline a little. It has the latch system. (Huge plus!!!) And easy adjust for height .
customer_reviews.author: vipergirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfy seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for each kid. We take long car trips often to visit family and friends. The seat has enough cushion that it is comfortable enough for the kids. Just recently, my oldest started using the belt positioning feature (no longer using the 5-point harness). It works well for her and holds the belt where it needs to be. It is pretty easy to take apart for cleaning compared to others I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H.

customer_reviews.text: The pro is that it's very lightweight. It's a good carseat to transfer from car to car. The con is that I didnt find it to be very user friendly in terms of the headrest and piece that allows the seat to sit back on an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: great carseat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this carseat!!! I was looking for a carseat for my car for when I have my grandson. I looked at every store possible but just couldn't find what fit my needs as I do not have him all the time i didn't want to spend a fortune. I decided to get on Amazon and take a look i found this one that was in a good price range and looked to be what I needed. I'm glad I did i am 100% satisfied with the car seat and the price. I recommend it to everyone. My daughter ended up selling her $300 carpet she had for everyday use and ordered this exact same one i bought
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy OBrien

customer_reviews.title: cheaper feeling buckles, but overall we like
customer_reviews.text: this is our secondary set of seats for out toddlers. Cupholders are pretty much a game changer! The kids seem to find them comfortable, so overall I do like them, but the buckles are definitely cheep feeling and more difficult than the nicer buckles.
customer_reviews.author: meagan

customer_reviews.title: Beware of buckle!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, looks nice and hides my child's spills. Easy to install and not too bulky. We bought a second one because we like this so much. I changed the review from 5 stars to 4 after my son ended up with bruises on his upper thighs from the buckle between his legs (buckle is pointy like a triangle). Turns out it was because we didn't have the fabric underneath it. Once we put that back on he was fine. Im mentioning this so that doesn't happen to your kids.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Love this sear
customer_reviews.text: I like this car seat so much I’ve purchased 4 of them. 2 for each car. They feel safe, easy to clean if there is a pee accident, just unsnap the bottom piece and throw in the washer. Also 2 cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Aim'ee Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Straps impossible to tighten forward facing
customer_reviews.text: The straps are extremely hard to tighten. I could not tighten them properly in the forward-facing position with my 30 lb tot in the seat. Only when the seat was empty could I tighten the straps. I've read other forums where some people were having the same issue, and others were not. Returned after 1 week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Doofinator

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a 2 in 1 car seat
customer_reviews.text: Easiest car seat I have ever installed. Very light. Best value I have found for a 2 in 1 car seat that I feel safe with. Only complaint I have is the padding seems very thin, probably is not the most comfortable for long trips.
customer_reviews.author: demonphoenix88

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat out there right now!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler had been wanting a car seat like this one for some time. Our oldest toddler had been bought one by her grandma. It definitely met our expectations! She can have her drinks in her cup holder and most importantly this car sear has amazing head support. So my babies head isn't terribly falling over when she falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: I really like these car seats and so do my children
customer_reviews.text: I really like these car seats and so do my children. These are a little bigger than other car seats and that's good to me. My children seem to have much more space to move around and grow into. The only downer to me is the way the latch/cord is placed, makes it harder to attach to the Safety Latch System, it's hard to tighten, you need to wiggle and wiggle to tighten. But overall, they feel safe and look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, easy to install and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: My mother bought one of these for her car to take our toddler out when shes babysitting. Really light weight and easy to install. We decided to purchase a second one for my husbands car so that we dont have to switch out other car seat back and forth. Great value for the price and my toddler seems to be happy with it too. Plus I like the buckle better than our more expensive Hraco I have in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Great seat! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said “this is the best seat ever”! We travel a lot and this seat is so comfortable for her. She weighs about 60lbs and is almost 6. She has special needs and so we still have her in the harness and it fits her perfect! It’s easy to use and I loved how we don’t have to cut or remove the harness when she is ready for a booster.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Good Seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat is great for our 3 year old. It has a wide range of adjustments and easy access to the strap adjustment. It is easy to disassemble (to a point) to clean for when it gets messy. We tried another seat and this one is by far better. We bought 2 of these now and will likely get another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: AdellAdam

customer_reviews.title: Great Marketing
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is growing and we needed a new carseat order this one thinking it would be a good value and keep us safe. The recline feature peice is completely missing, as well as one of the chest clips and a back tether. It is unusable thus being a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: NaeClain

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat especially for the price, it was on special for $89.99 when I ordered. It was very easy to install with the anchors. It fits my Nissan Altima well & my son enjoys facing forward. I guess I can kind of see how some reviews say it’s uncomfortable because the padding isn’t very thick but neither was my sons rear facing car seat. I checked the foam in the head rest & thankfully mine was all intact. I’m very glad I went with this product & I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my almost 6 year old grandson; he loves it and it fits him well. He's tall and slender and says there is plenty of padding for him. His Mom really likes the 5 point harness system.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice seat for our third vehicle. I drive my 2 door wrangler a lot now that we can use a front facing seat. The quality seems great and the buckles are very similar to our other seats (both slimfits). Overall a good value.
customer_reviews.author: twlightning

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, midsize, 5 point booster
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and remove. We have two of them. One for our GMC Yukon, and one for our Cadillac CTS-V. It fits nicely in both cars. It is small enough to get in and out easily if someone needs to borrow it, but doesn't feel cheap or under-built. Easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: jeri

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and safety features are abundant!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this seat to have as an extra and now I'm wishing I would've bought 2. So much easier to install than our other higher priced and heavier seat. I purchased this through the Amazon Warehouse and it did not disappoint! Original packaging and it was still sealed in plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Norton

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy car seat
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy seat. I like the 5 point harness. Our son is 40 pounds, and we wanted to go with the safest option. This seems to fit the bill. Only small complaint is that it is heavy, so not very portable. Our son likes the cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Scot W

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice car seat, but it doesn’t fit real snug in our equinox so I also use the shoulder and lap belt too in addition to the 5-point harness. Figured it’s a good transition anyway to get my autistic son used to being buckled into the car with the seatbelt. It fits good enough without the seatbelt, just a bit more movement using only the latch system then I’m comfortable with.
customer_reviews.author: Bmj0nes

customer_reviews.title: Good seat but bulky
customer_reviews.text: Good durable seat, comfy for long rides, safe choice but but hard for child to climb over the dual cup holders. May not work if you need to fit 3 people in backseat as the seat is wide. I prefer our Graco Tranzitions 3-in-1 that we have for another car as it’s narrower and the cup holders are set lower so a child can get themselves in.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, old latch system.
customer_reviews.text: My two year old who is very particular loves his new seat. Installation was the easiest I’ve ever done with this outdated latch system. That being said, I do wish it had the easier latch belt, these ones can be hard to use
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, only one small issue.
customer_reviews.text: So far we’ve really liked this booster seat my four year old loves the cup holders (I do too, they’re nice and deep). I will say this thing is hard to get tight once you buckle your little one in. I have to literally crawl into my suv and pull the strap to get it tight enough and that part isn’t great, it’s like a workout every time I put my son into the car. Other than that it seems to be great, also shipping was crazy fast! If it was easier to tighten I would of given this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sturner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the car seat. Easy to clean and super easy and fast to install and remove it when needed. The straps are really easy to tighten and loosen as well. The only down part about it is they sit straight up so if they fall asleep in it their head tends to fall forward some but there are ways around that. It’s a great seat and have loved it since day one!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: It is so comfortable and the adjustable headrest will allow him to use ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this seat. It is so comfortable and the adjustable headrest will allow him to use it for a long time! Super easy to install and install. Love that the latches have hooks to store them when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This car seat is great! It's easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is great! It's easy to install. I love no rethread harness seats. The straps on this one have never twisted like other seats I've had. It's a super easy install. I haven't used it in booster mode since my child is only 4.5, but I have a graco booster for my older child I expect the fit to be similar. This was a great purchase and I have suggested it to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this seat!! It was very easy to install and has great safety features that I really appreciate. My nephew loves his new seat! LOL said it makes him feel like a big boy
customer_reviews.author: Dazia

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my Great Granddaughter who is 2 1/2 yrs. My Grandson and wife installed it for.me. So I had the easy part. But works her perfectly and happy I can use it for a booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: MSN

customer_reviews.title: Nice carseat
customer_reviews.text: We like this car seat. I bought one of these, then bought a different one for a second child, but that one had rattling problems, so ended up buying a second Graco Atlas 65.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Secure and padded
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat! We’ve tried many over the last few years between 3 cars. This one is the most comfy, is nicely padded, feels super secure when buckled, fits easily in car and the cup holders are great. Excellent value for money!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A pain in the a$$ to install and to use
customer_reviews.text: There is only one strap for the install adjustment. Impossible to get it tight. I waited too long to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Bummed!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this seat. I was looking forward to it because of the size and safety Graco offers but this seat is a let down. The strap for loosening/tightening is forever coming off track and getting stuck. It’s starting to fray so badly that I’m back in the car seat market after only a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s got cup holders!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to use. Have taken this on a plane strapped to my bag running through the airport. Wasn’t too bulky and popped in and out of Uber’s without issue! The kid was also thrilled for new car seat day. A good five minutes of celebrating the cup holders alone!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love this car seat. it’s worth the price. easy to install and to configure to your child. the recline feature and head rest are nice, so your kid’s head doesn’t fall when they sleep. cup holders are deep and detach from seat for easy cleaning! overall a very nice car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro & Ciara Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves how easy this seat is to buckle. For the price I thought it was going to seam cheap but it seems very nice. Not much padding but the way the the seat is shaped it seems ok and my daughter said she is very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Deja Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: We like it :)
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheaper material compared to my Graco 4ever BUT very good carseat. It was super easy to install and my child told me it was comfortable. It has side protection which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Catcity

customer_reviews.title: Car seat looks great in the car but it’s not very easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Car seat looks great in the car but it’s not very easy to install and tighten and I am having the hardest time getting it out to move to another car. I’m not fond of Gracos latch on this seat also 4 and 6 year old cannot undo bottom buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Grandson rides in comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat for those older kids that face forward. Easy to install in the car and my grandson can get it and out with ease. Harness is easy to buckle once he is in and straps stow out of the way when he's not in so finding them once he gets in is easy.
customer_reviews.author: O. Collins

product_meta.title: Graco Atlas 65 2 in 1 Harness Booster Seat | Harness Booster and High Back Booster in One, Glacier
product_meta.description: The Atlas 65 2-in-1 harness booster car seat is designed to grow with your child as a harness booster from 22 to 65 pounds to a high back booster 30 to 100 pounds. The ultra-easy Simply Safe Adjust Harness System adjusts the harness and headrest together - with no time-consuming rethreading - to 10 height positions, making it simple to keep your child properly positioned. It features a handy harness storage compartment, which allows you to keep the harness with the seat, even when you've transitioned to high back booster mode. It features dual cupholders and a machine washable seat pad, buckle cover and harness covers. Care and Maintenance: Machine-washable seat cushion. Metal and plastic parts may be cleaned with mild soap and cool water. Buckle may be cleaned with a damp cloth Damp Cloth. Harness straps may be spot cleaned. Recommended Age Range: See weight/height range Child Occupancy Max: 1 Weight Range: 22-65 lbs with 5-Point Harness, 30-100 lbs as High back Booster Height Range: 27"-49" with 5-Point Harness, 38"-57" as High back Booster.
feature_bullets: 2 in 1 booster car seat converts from a 5 Point harness forward facing car seat (22 65 pounds) to a high back belt positioning booster (30 100 pounds)
Integrated harness storage compartment stores unused harness straps
One hand, 5 position adjustable headrest easily adapts for Your growing child
Integrated, dual cup Holders help keep Your child's drink close; Harness straps may be spot cleaned
Seat pad, harness, and buckle covers are comfortable and Machine washable; Engineered and crash tested to meet or exceed US standard FMVSS 213
Simply Safe Adjust Harness System adjusts the height of Your harness and headrest in one motion, to ensure that Your child is always properly Secured , Car Seat Weight Without Base 18 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,779 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
